Total Time: 20 minutes
 
 Category: Dinner
 
 Serving Size: 4
 
 Ingredients:
 1 lb. pasta
 1/2 cup heavy cream
 1/2 cup butter
 1/2 cup parmesan
 1/4 cup parsley
 Black pepper
 2 tbsp. parsley
 
 Instructions:
 1. In a large pot of boiling water, cook pasta according to package instructions. 
 2. In a large skillet over medium heat, add cream and butter. Cook until the butter is melted and the cream is heated through. Whisk in Parmesan and season with salt and pepper. 
 3. Remove from heat.
 4. Add cooked pasta and toss until coated in sauce. Garnish with parsley and serve immediately.
 5. Enjoy!
